org.opendaylight.controller.frm

Class FRMActivator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.sal.binding.api.AbstractBrokerAwareActivator
      • org.opendaylight.controller.sal.binding.api.AbstractBindingAwareProvider
        • org.opendaylight.controller.frm.FRMActivator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BindingAwareProvider, org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator

    public class FRMActivator
extends AbstractBindingAwareProvider
    Forwarding Rules Manager Activator Activator ForwardingRulesManager. It registers all listeners (DataChangeEvent, ReconcilNotification) in the Session Initialization phase.
    Author:
    Vaclav Demcak *

    • Method Detail

      • onSessionInitiated

        public void onSessionInitiated(BindingAwareBroker.ProviderContext session)
        Description copied from interface: BindingAwareProvider
        Callback signaling initialization of the consumer session to the SAL. The consumer MUST use the session for all communication with SAL or retrieving SAL infrastructure services. This method is invoked by BindingAwareBroker#registerProvider(BindingAwareProvider)
        Parameters:
        session - Unique session between consumer and SAL.
